org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.xades.xml.impl

Class XMLChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.xades.xml.impl.XMLChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Checker

    public class XMLChecker
extends Object
implements Checker
    This implementation is based in XAdEs standard, available in https://www.w3.org/TR/XAdES/ and Brazilian digital signature standards presented in https://www.gov.br/iti/pt-br/centrais-de-conteudo/doc-icp-15-03-versao-7-4-req-das-pol-de-assin-dig-na-icp-brasil-pdf
    Author:
    Fabiano Kuss <fabiano.kuss@serpro.gov.br>, Emerson Saito <emerson.saito@serpro.gov.br>

      Verify signature from File Name and location.

      * XML signature validation using byte[] data.
      boolean check(byte[] signedContent, byte[] signature)
      XML signature validation with detached content .

      XML signature validation using document.
      boolean check(InputStream isXMLFile)
      XML signature validation from InputStream that represents a XML file.
      boolean check(InputStream isContent, InputStream isXMLSignature)
      XML signature detached validation from InputStream that represents a content and XML Signature
      boolean check(String xmlAsString)
      Verify signature from String that represents a XML Document The content must contains both content and signature
      boolean check(String signedContentFileName, String signatureFileName)
      XML signature validation with detached content from path and file names example: check("/tmp/signedFile","/tmp/signaturefile.xml")

      XML signature validation with detached hash content and signature.
